mapper.select: SELECT FROM menu WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.parent_id, m.sort, m.type, m.permission, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM menu m INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{role} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC, m.id ASC
SELECT FROM menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (name, path, component, icon, parent_id, sort, type, permission, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{path}, #{component}, #{icon}, #{parentId}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{permission}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
